dublin_core.dcvalue: In the past decade robotic technology has been increasingly incorporated into various industries including surgery and medicine This chapter will review the history development current applications and future of robotic technology in reproductive medicine A literature search was performed for all publications regarding robotic technology in medicine surgery reproductive endocrinology and its role in both surgical education and telepresence surgery As robotic assisted surgery has emerged this technology provides a feasible option for minimally invasive surgery impacts surgical education and plays a role in telepresence surgery
Frontiers in bioscience : a journal and virtual library
